2auth: ! Wenn du dein Wikipedia-Benutzerkonto bestätigen möchstest, schreibe bitte **.auth**
pmoff2: , bitte schalte sie ein, indem du den Pfeil neben GUILDNAME anklickst und dann die Privatsphäreeinstellungen auswählst. Dann tippe **.auth** erneut ein.
pmauth: Um dein Wikipedia-Konto zu bestätigen, folge bitte diesem Link:
hwho: **.whois *userid*** - gib die Discord-Nutzer-ID ein, um das entsprechende Benutzerkonto eines bestätigten Nutzers zu sehen
max8: Nur bis zu höchstens zehn sind aufgeführt. Klicke oben den Benutzernamen an, um alle Informationen zu sehen.
hwho2: Um diesen Befehl zu nutzen, schreibe **.whois *userid***
notauthd: Dieser Nutzer scheint nicht bestätigt zu sein.
needmanser: Du benötigst **Server-verwalten**-Rechte, um diesen Befehl zu nutzen.
alrauth2: authentifiziert, es ist nichts weiter erforderlich.
sellang: Bitte wähle eine der folgenden Sprachen aus
errlang: Ich konnte diese Sprache nicht finden, für neue Sprachen kontaktiere bitte IVORK#0001, sonst wähle eine der folgenden
cantass: I don't appear to have access to asssign this role. Please ensure that my WikiAuth role is above
cantass2: in the server roles list so that I can have access, also that I have *manage_roles* access. Once you've made the changes, simply use the same command again to attempt to re-assign the role to all auth'd members. For repeat occurances, contact IVORK#0001.
havass: I have assigned the ROLENAME role to COUNT/LENMESSAGEGUILDMEMBERS user(s) that are already authenticated.
nfindrole: I could not find the role MESCONTSPLI1. To use this command, please either tag it, or paste its ID.
etagid: To use this command, please either tag it, or paste its ID.
cantsend: I cannot send messages in CHANNAME, please enable me send_messages permissions and use the command again. For persistent issues, contact IVORK#0001.
ssetachan: Successfully set CHANNAME as the authentication messages channel. To disable, type *.setachan none*.
sremwchan: Successfully removed welcome channel. Use **.setwchan *channeltag/channelid*** to set it again.
cfchan: I could not find SPLITTOID. Please ensure the ID is correct and that I have permissions to see the channel.
sremachan: Successfully removed authentication channel. Use **.setachan *channeltag/channelid*** to set it again.
hsetwchan: To use this command, type **.setwchan #general** or ***221049808784326656*** or use ***none*** to disable.
ssetwchan: Successfully set CHANNAME as the welcome channel. To disable, type *.setwchan none*.
helpcommands:
**.status** - check the status of the bot's host
**.setlang *Language*** - Choose server language from the following: AVAILLANG
**.setachan *#auth-channel*** or ***channel id*** - set channel bot posts authentication messages to CURACHAN
**.setrole *@authrole*** or ***role id*** - set role to be assigned to authenticated users CURROLE
**.setwchan *#general*** or ***channel id*** - set channel bot posts welcome messages to CURWCHAN
**.setblock *yes*** or ***no*** - disallows blocked users to authenticate CURSBLOCK
**.settype *W*** or ***M*** or ***F*** - set server authentication type for Wikimedia or Miraheze or Fandom CURSMIRA
**.invite** - get a link to invite this bot to your own server
invt: To invite this bot to your own server, use the following link
Cantfindusedisplayorid: Ich konnte keinen Nutzer mit dem Namen *unam* finden. Stelle sicher, dass du seinen Nicknamen verwendest, oder benutze seine UserID.
YN2B: Please enter a value of either **yes** or **no** for whether you want to allow blocked users to authenticate.
YNBS: Successfully set disallowing of blocked members authenticating to **VAL**.
BlockAuth: Sorry, you could not be authenticated in the **GUILDNAME** server as they don't allow blocked users to authenticate which your account **UNAM** appears to be. Please try again once unblocked.
YN2M: Please enter a value of either **W** for Wikipedia, **M** for Miraheze or **F** for Fandom.
